articles.description: Panaji: The All India Football Federation (AIFF) has been forced to postpone the preparatory camp for the AFC U-23 Asian Cup qualifiers after clubs re.

articles.title: Durand Cup 2023: Mohun Bagan edge past Punjab FC to bag successive win - Khel Now
articles.description: Mohun Bagan defeated Punjab FC in the Durand Cup 2023 to solidify their chances of heading into the knockouts.
articles.content: Mohun Bagan Super Giant beat Punjab FC 2-0 to secure their second consecutive victory in a Group A fixture of the 132nd IndianOil Durand Cup being played here at the Kishore Bharathi Krirangan. Melro… [+2549 chars]
